options.name: Wallrunner
options.description: Gain +1 Movespeed. Use your Movement Speed to climb or move across walls and surfaces. If you reach a stable surface during your Move Action, you can attach to it. If not, you fall.

options.name: Ambusher
options.description: Gain +1 Initiative. When you start a Combat Hidden or Invisible, you gain an extra Action on your first turn of Combat and you remain Hidden or Invisible until the end of your turn.

options.name: Reaction : Lightning Reflexes
options.description: When Targeted by a Projectile or Ray, you use your Initiative Check instead of the standard Defense Check until the start of your next turn.

options.name: Deadly Throwing
options.description: When you use a Throwing Ammunition, the Dice is upgraded from a 1d6 to a 1d10. This Damage is doubled if you are Hidden.
